title: February Fourteenth
description: Getting dumped on Valentine’s Day sucks... which is why I hate the holiday.I have commitment issues, so I created a motto for myself “Fuck & Fump” it worked until I met Blake Riley... Being the son of a multi-billionaire has its perks...I can sleep around, be the rich playboy everyone knows me to be but a trip to Miami upends my world...Tasha Harris happened.
author: C. Renee
